attributes.action: Encourage the construction of more "pumped storage"  electricity generation facilities
attributes.additional_details:
Please now consider  giving subsidies  to companies prepared to construct Pumped storage   electricity generating  stations.

If they can be linked to existing wind farms   so much the better.

It is time to  call a halt to the building of yet more  wind farms.  We need a better alternative than wind power.
Water power is now the way forward.
